page.title: 08WORK SURVEY FOR DUNLOP
page.content: IN DUNLOP 21% OF THE POPULATION OF 113 WORK IN THE VILLAGE AND 38% WORK OUT OF THE VILLAGE.ABOUT 11% OF THE COMMUNITY LIVE AND WORK ON FARMS.13% OF THE PEOPLE WORK IN OTHER JOBS IN AND OUT OF THE VILLAGE.17% OF THE PEOPLE IN DUNLOP ARE UNEMPLOYED.THE BIGGEST BUSINESS IN DUNLOP AT THE MOMENT IS HOWIES.THE BANK IN DUNLOP ONLY EMPLOYES 5 PEOPLE.IN DUNLOP THERE ARE 4 SHOPS,THE NEWSAGENTS,GENERAL STORE,MACE AND GROCERS .2% OF PEOPLE WORK AT THE NEWSAGENTS,4% OF PEOPLE WORK AT THE GENERAL STORE,4% OF THE PEOPLE WORK AT MACE AND 3% OF THE PEOPLE WORK AT THE GROCERS.WHEN YOU LEAVE SCHOOL YOU HAVE VERY LITTLE CHANCE OF GETTING A JOB LOCALLY.
